name: THE LOST PLACE
description:
After a long time the character want's to meet his friend but after few hours of driving someone kidnapped him .After lot's of effort he unlocked the the main door of the house in which kidnapper's kept him . Suddenly , floor collapse and he fall down.

Now your story start's

This is a story based horror game in Hindi language and have English subtitles.

W / A / S / D :- WALK

Q :- FLASHLIGHT

E :- INTERACT
